Message: My fiancé was an awful man.

He would lock women in
his estate and do whatever
he wanted with them.

But he never paid attention
to me—I was too young.

I watched the women get
punched and kicked...
Ahh, it must’ve hurt...

Everyone hated him...
but no one dared to go against him.
They feared the consequences.

So instead, they struggled
through each day covered in scars.

The beautiful romance that I had
always dreamed of was smashed
to pieces right before my eyes.
